item.title: Might The Supreme Court Save Trump’s Economic Chestnuts?
item.description: What's a poor, beleaguered president to do?

item.title: Pfizer Alleges Novo Nordisk’s Bid to Buy Obesity Biotech Metsera is Anticompetitive, Illegal
item.description: Metsera called the arguments “nonsense” and said Pfizer is trying to buy the obesity drug developer for less than what Novo is willing to pay.

item.title: Thermo Fisher Expands Biopharma Offerings With $9B Deal for Clinical Trial Software Firm Clario
item.description: Private equity-backed Clario brings to Thermo Fisher Scientific software that collects, manages, and analyzes clinical trial endpoint data.

item.title: New Report On AI Use In-House Spells Trouble For Outside Lawyers
item.description: Because outside lawyers are lagging so far behind in-house and apparently making little effort to catch up, it’s not hard to envision a day of reckoni...

item.title: Comey Files Motions To Dismiss For MA’AM DO YOU EVEN LAW?
item.description: This indictment reads like it was drafted by someone who never set foot in a grand jury room before. Oh, wait!
